name: The Telecoming Group
tag_list: tech, telco, innovation, call-center, contact-center, online-advertising, internetadvertising, on-line-advertising, add-value, payment, wallet, online-payment, virtual-pos, social-media-marketing, make-money-web, corporate-communication, seo, voice-contro
overview: The Telecoming Group is a Spanish technology group specializing in advanced telecommunications solutions. It consists of four specialized companies: Telecoming Connectivity Solutions (Value-added telecommunications integrator), Telecoming Payment Solutions (native digital payment entity specializing in e-commerce and m-commerce, through its Pagantis product), Telecoming Business Solutions (a quality corporate communications company) and Telecoming Advertising Solutions (online advertising agency). It was founded in 2008 and since then has registered double-digit growth in sales per year.

offices.address1: Torre Europa. Paseo de la Castellana 95, 16 Floor
